name: Joust Punk
description:
This is a mockup that has been created during MockupJam. The game is going to be developed in upcoming weeks/months.

Welcome to to the JOUST PUNK!

In this game, classic medieval joust traveled thru the time  into the future where are speeders instead of horses and lances with laser blades, electrifying spikes and more. 

Become a true knight, fight in tournaments, buy and upgrade speeders, lances, armors. The fame is inevitable.

Main features:

- knight on knight jousting

- variety of equipment (speeders, lances, armors) + upgrades

- strategy - plan you gear wisely for each fight and tournament. 

- fights are based on your stats but also our gaming skill

More info to come in upcoming weeks/months. If you'd have an idea what this game should have in order to be more attractive for you, player, do not hesitate to let me know. I will appreciate any feedback. 

Thank you for your time!
